text: Luoxian Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the seat of Beihu District in Chenzhou Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. The subdistrict was formed through the amalgamation of Gaobi Village () of the former Chenjiang Town (), Luoxian Community () of Yanquan Subdistrict () and 3 villages of the former Shijao Township () in April 2012.2012年4月，湖南省民政厅 湘民行发〔2012〕16号 批复同意: 撤销保和、市郊2个乡和郴江、万华岩2个镇，设立保和镇和郴江、骆仙、增福3个街道。（其中）骆仙街道辖原郴江镇的高壁建制村和原燕泉街道的骆仙居委会，以及原市郊乡的骆仙铺、欧冲、杉山岭3个建制村，共4个建制村、1个居委会，总面积23.88平方公里，总人口1.94万人，办事处驻骆仙铺村. see xzqh.org (2014-04-02) It has an area of with a population of 19,400 (as of 2012). In May 2016,(2016年)北湖骆仙街道建制村合并全面完成 see Chenzhou Daily (newspaper) (2016-05-23) or czxww.cn (2016-05-24) the subdistrict was divided into 3 communities and 2 villages, its seat is at Luoxianpu (). ==References== Category:Divisions of Beihu District, Chenzhou Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Luoxian Subdistrict
